result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeffery Lee Colvin

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jeffery Lee Colvin not in court, in custody.  Attorney Zoey Stefaniak in court for Jeffery Lee Colvin.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense has discovery and an offer. Parties are still negotiating and requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 12-5-22 at 1:30 pm for status conference.
Status conference scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with TDP; AJS.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jeffery Lee Colvin appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Colin Patrick McGinn appeared by video for Jeffery Lee Colvin.  Attorney Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
